title: What is this Square Sans?
content:
I know I have seen this before. Does wired use a stencil version of this?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106165530im_/http:/typophile.com/files/TanaFrench_6314.jpg)
author: KeenanC

comments.content: The fairly uncommon [FF Hydra](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106165530/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_hydra_book/?sample_text=TANA%20FRENCH&sample_size=74). Would love to know where you found it.

I write for [covers.fwis.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106165530/http:/covers.fwis.com/), and this is a cover we intend to post up soon.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106165530im_/http:/typophile.com/files/51l9iNgenTL_4229.jpg)

Nice, Keenan. Glad you'll be mentioning the typeface. "A Novel" is likely in [Adobe Caslon](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106165530/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/adobe_caslon_pro_italic/?sample_text=See%20swashes%20below.&acs_pt=36&acs_ss=20) with swash caps.
